name: user-delete.toml

event.name: User Deleted
event.description: User was removed from the system

rawContent:
[event]
id = "user.delete"
name = "User Deleted"
description = "User was removed from the system"
category = "auth"

[trigger]
action = "click"
element = "Delete button on user card"

[[payload]]
name = "userId"
type = "string"
description = "Deleted user ID"

[relations]
pages = ["users"]
entities = ["user"]

[implementation]
handler = "handleDeleteUser"
file = "core/app/src/pages/prototype/UsersPage.tsx"
line = 54
preview = "/prototype/users"
status = "implemented"
